data.actual_result: The button redirects to an invalid article
data.expected_result: The button should go to the specified help page
data.short_description: [Edge ONLY] Denying Discord microphone access then clicking to go to the Help Desk makes Discord show an undefined article
data.steps_to_repro: - Open Edge - Unmute yourself, or join a voice channel - "Microphone Access is Denied" modal should appear - Click "Help Desk" - A new tab opens that brings you to an undefined help article
